required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Peripherally Inserted Versus Centrally Inserted Central Venous Catheters in the Neurosurgical Intensive Care Unit
clinical_study.official_title: Peripherally Inserted Versus Centrally Inserted Central Venous Catheters in the Neurosurgical Intensive Care Unit. Comparative of Cost-Effectiveness and Safety

lead_sponsor.agency: First Affiliated Hospital Xi'an Jiaotong University

clinical_study.source: First Affiliated Hospital Xi'an Jiaotong University

brief_summary.textblock: This study aim to compare the cost-effectiveness and safety between centrally and peripherally inserted central venous catheters in neurosurgical intensive care unit patients.

primary_outcome.time_frame: up to 30 days or be discharged from hospital
up to 30 days or be discharged from hospital
primary_outcome.description: pneumothorax or hematoma caused by puncture

primary_outcome.time_frame: up to 30 days or be discharged from hospital

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 30 days or be discharged from hospital
up to 30 days or be discharged from hospital
secondary_outcome.description: The cost of catheter implantation and replacement, as well as the cost of treatment due to catheter-related complications and the resulting financial loss to the patient.

arm_group.description: Patients randomly assigned to receive a peripherally inserted central catheter(PICC).
Patients randomly assigned to receive a centrally inserted central venous catheter(CVC).

intervention.description: The peripherally inserted central catheter with different sizes (French scale). Trained vascular access nurses will perform the insertion of the PICC, guided by ultrasound at bedside using the Seldinger technique. A suitable sterile field will be established.
The central venous catheter with different sizes (French scale). Trained doctors will perform the insertion of the CVC, using the Seldinger technique. A suitable sterile field will be established.

overall_official.affiliation: First Affiliated Hospital Xi'an Jiaotong University

facility.name: First Affiliated Hospital of Xian Jiaotong University
